title: Process a Late Payment Notice
description: A customer's premium payment is overdue, and the system needs to send a late payment/cancellation notice.

tasks.description: Identify all policies with payments that are past the grace period.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system generates a list of policies pending cancellation for non-payment.

tasks.description: For each policy, generate the legally required notice of pending cancellation.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system generates the correct legal notice for each customer.

tasks.description: Send the notices to the customers.
